title: Season 6 Jinx 5.55x Total Damage on one auto?
body:
2.75x {{item:3031}} 

2.5x1.1= 2.75 (Primary attack with Crit with {{item:3031}} 
2.5x.55=1.375 Secondary Bolt which can now Crit (and has for this maths on the left) with Runaan's that applies 50 percent of your 110% Damage rockets to nearby targets, so if your two Runaan's bolts hit targets in the blast radius of your primary target, they apply their own rocket damage that also splashes and counts as a secondary attack hence applying (with a crit with {{item:3031}} 2.5x their base damage of 110% of your total AD times .5 (Bolts only apply 50% damage so your side rocket applications that happen to splash onto the primary target dealing 1.375x your total AD when they crit if the new Runaan's works with her Rockets like it does now)

plus another one if you are lucky enough to runaans 2 rockets plus your primary attack critting with the two side bolt rockets critting onto 1 target (I've used Runaan's Jinx mainly when fed and it's not ridiculously easy but it's not ridiculously hard to do this as currently is for 2.75x AD plus 110% times 50% of your total AD plus another 110% of your total AD times 50% totalling 2.75x damage plus 110% of your total damage equalling 3.85x Damage with one auto.

5.55xdamage in the new patch or are their restrictions on her with the Runaan's Changes?

Not saying it's ridiculously good but if you get ahead as I have before and pick up a {{item:3031}} {{item:3085}} {{item:3134}} {{item:3086}} {{item:3141}} (20 stacks) and {{item:3006}} You can easily hit 300 AD early game and be popping one person next to 2 minions or Champions for 1155 Damage and will now be able to do 1665 with one auto if you can hit 300 AD earlyish without the {{item:3141}} being available which is a pretty nasty chunk (1 shot on their AP Carry realistically if they have been poked to 1100 HP which is usually like 4/5ths of their HP, or maybe 3/5ths).

P.S If you didn't know this is how Jinx's Rockets ( http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/b/be/Fishbones%2C_the_Rocket_Launcher.png ) Worked I've posted a link to the Lolwiki which explains the unique interaction of Jinx with Runaan's Hurricane and her Rockets [Fishbones] and can confirm myself this is how it works) http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Jinx 
(In the "Ability Details" tab of "Switcheroo" Section it details the interaction of Runaan's and Fishbones). 

It's sort of similar to the old Tiamat's interaction with Shyvana:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Urbtok_o21Y

but a lot less situational, a lot less powerful and easier to pull off, but almost as fun to do :p.

replies.body: okay except hurricane bolts don't apply the AOE for jinx rockets they changed that like the patch after she was released cause it was broken
No they didn't they still do.

> [{quoted}](name=Alfawarrior3,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=0GhLTZEz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-11-10T11:44:17.790+0000)
>
> okay except hurricane bolts don't apply the AOE for jinx rockets they changed that like the patch after she was released cause it was broken

You are correct i believe they removed the AOE for the secondary rockets. They do have the chance to Crit now with that item which makes it interesting!

The side rockets can overlap, it applies rockets to whatever the runaan's bolts hit and they do 50% damage because they're considered an on-hit effect for all maths and purposes with the runaans damage decrease (50% for runaans'd projectiles).

You can put out 5.55x damage with one auto if you're lucky with side crits and primary crit and they're standing next to two minions or champions and this season it's a viable item on her IMO.

I'm pretty sure armour reduces a lot more than 1665 -> 1100

but it's so extremely RNG and I'd be seriously annoyed if it happens to me.

Nah the 1100 is how Runaan's currently works without crit, but the new one - the side bolts can crit so the same build and auto, with a lucky crit on the two side bolts in an auto splashing the 2 side rockets onto one person she would do 1655 damage instead of 1100 (before armor reduction, 50 Armor will drop that by 25% and 100 Armor will drop that by 50% but that's still a hefty chunk on someone plus Armor pen is only just around the corner... it is pretty luck based, although you'll still be doing 220% of your total AD as Damage in one auto if you do a non-crit auto on a cluster of 3 in range of the splashes and I feel like with the new items added and the Changes - a better build path might pop up than the sort of trap builds right now where you have {{item:3031}} and {{item:3085}} but need Armor pen, Lifesteal and can't pick up anything mobility based without taking an early {{item:3142}} so if you want a defense item you have to sacrifice movespeed and if you take a Youmuu's you have to sacrifice {{item:3035}} or {{item:3072}} if you want a defense item and that's often bad (sacrificing % armor pen or lifesteal and damage and shield in one item - and a Jinx with no movespeed is a really bad idea in most cases too and I think because of the item Changes and additions, paths might pop up or she might have opportunities to take the build as a core or if metas arise on enemies that give her opportunities it could become a fun way to build her and be competitive rather than occasionally viable).

Jinx = new Kayle

Also Sword of the Occult is being deleted, thats not funny, jerk. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

Lol.

Yeah I know I said, but you can still attempt to hit that high Damage mid game and be popping them 1655 Damage single autos if you have 300 AD which isn't hard to attain in a less Sword of the Occult stackage slightly later game {{item:3031}} and {{item:3072}} with a {{item:3085}} and maybe {{item:1037}} plus with just {{item:3031}} and {{item:3085}} you'll still have the chance to be doing 5.55x like 160 Damage which is still a nice 888 damage pop on someone.

Youmuu's might actually go well with a Runaan's 1655 Single target auto oriented build since it is good to pop and herd people into their team/minions with the active and isn't a hugely bad item, considering even without it's use for this herding into splash concept it helps make up for the lack of MS from {{item:3085}} instead of {{item:3046}}/{{item:3087}} and gives some stats that might help counter your less mobile build even though it's pretty expensive and risky to be taking it for just this and with careful play you might not need it...
